track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description:
Welcome to the 6th edition of HourRank! It's a one-hour rated contest with 3-4 algorithmic challenges. Are you fast and accurate enough to win it?
Problemsetter for this round is Kamil Debowski (Errichto) and Samiul Islam(Forthright48).
primary_contest.name: HourRank 6

model.preview: n boys, m girls, the expected value of the number of dances.
model.name: Bear and Dancing
